page.title: 19ST.ANDREW'S CHURCH & SCHOOL
page.content: {Andrew Leslie}had to build a{school} for his workers' children to give them an education.In the{early 1880's}he built a church and dedicated it to his wife, Margaret.It was named after the patron saint of Scotland,Andrew.He died in 1894,six years after his wife;the family kept the church going. They closed the church down,but they could not demolish it because it was a {listed building}because of its{Gothic architecture.About one year ago they started modernising it because it had been vandalised.They could not afford to heat the church,so they put a false ceiling in.Then they decided to make the{church}and school into{workshops and offices.They expect the alterations to be finished within the next six months.
